blueprint.description: Installs Beets, a music library manager CLI, on nearly any platform
blueprint.overview: The purpose of [Beets](https://beets.io/) is to get your music collection right once and for all. It catalogs your collection, automatically improving its metadata as it goes using the MusicBrainz database. Then it provides a bouquet of tools for manipulating and accessing your music.
blueprint.name: Beets
blueprint.title: Beets
